body:
This used to work, but now there is an error:

```
$ spack install $installopts petsc %gcc@5.3.0-spack +boost +hdf5 +mpi ^boost+mpi ^hdf5+mpi ^openblas ^openmpi ^python %clang-7.3.0-apple
==> Error: Identifier cannot contain '.'
```

The problem seems to be the dots in the compiler name `clang-7.3.0-apple`.
title: Cannot use compiler spec with dependency
